vote.title: Authorize Contract Amendment No. 1 to the construction services contract with XIT Paving & Construction, Inc. for the construction of the Five Mile Infrastructure Improvements Package A Project to increase the contract amount in the amount of $842,353.00 (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Not to exceed $842,353.00, from $11,564,976.75 to $12,407,329.75 - Financing: Wastewater Construction Fund ($115,880.00), Water Construction Fund ($232,793.00), and 2024B Certificates of Obligation Fund ($493,680.00)
vote.description: Authorize Contract Amendment No. 1 to the construction services contract with XIT Paving & Construction, Inc. for the construction of the Five Mile Infrastructure Improvements Package A Project to increase the contract amount in the amount of $842,353.00 (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) - Not to exceed $842,353.00, from $11,564,976.75 to $12,407,329.75 - Financing: Wastewater Construction Fund ($115,880.00), Water Construction Fund ($232,793.00), and 2024B Certificates of Obligation Fund ($493,680.00)
